醆字的基本解释

醆
zhǎn
古同“盏”：“别时酒醆照灯花。”

醆字的汉语字典释义

[①]［zhǎn］
［《廣韻》阻限切，上産，莊。］
［《廣韻》旨善切，上獮，章。］
(1)白色浊酒。即《周礼》五齐中的盎齐。犹今之白水酒。
(2)用同“盞”。酒杯。
(3)指茶杯。
(4)用作量词。用于盛器、灯等等。

醆字的康熙字典解释

【酉集下】【酉字部】　醆； 康熙笔画：15； 页码：页1284第17
【唐韻】【集韻】【韻會】?阻限切，音琖。【說文】爵也。【詩·大雅·洗爵奠斝傳】夏曰醆。【釋文】醆，則?反，或作琖。　又【說文】酒濁而微淸也。【集韻】盎齊也。【禮·禮運】醴醆在戸。又【效特牲】醆酒涗于淸。【註】醆酒，盎齊也。涗，泲也。淸酒冬釀，接夏而成。盎齊差淸，先和以淸酒，而後泲之。以其差淸，故不用茅也。　又【廣韻】【集韻】?旨善切，音?。義同。

醆字的源字形

字源演变：

小篆楷体

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体日本明朝体韩国明朝体旧字形
醆字的起名意思

暂无。

Glutinous rice
Basic explanation of words
Glutinous rice
zhǎn
Ancient Tong "Zhan": "Don't lighten lanterns with wine and glutinous rice."
Glutinous rice
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［zhǎn］
["Guangyun" restricts cutting, high production, Zhuang. ]
["Guangyun" aims to be good, first, chapter. ]
(1) White muddy wine. That is, Angqi in the five qi of "Zhou Li". Still today's white water wine.
(2) Use the same "bowl". Wine glass.
(3) Refers to teacup.
(4) Used as a quantifier. Used in containers, lights, etc.
Glutinous rice
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[You Ji 2] [You Zi Department] 　醆; Kangxi Strokes: 15; Page Number: Page 1284 Page 17
【Tang Yun】【Ji Yun】【Rhyme Meeting】? Restricted cut, sound 琖. [Said the text] Jue also. 【Poetry·Daya·Xijue Dianzhu Biography】Xia Yueliang. [Explanation] 醆, then? Reverse, or 琖.　[Shuowen] The wine is turbid and faint. [Ji Yun] Ang Qi also. 【Rite·Rite Luck】Li Li is in the dome. Also 【Effective Sacrifice】Mixed wine is in the air. [Note] Mojiu, Angqi also. Chuan, Chuan also. Cheongjiu is made in winter and made from summer. Angqi Chacheong, first and Yichang wine, and then Luzhi. Because of the difference, it is not necessary.　[Guangyun] [Jiyun]? Purpose is good, sound? The same meaning.
